document.text:
From: 
To:' 
Cc:I
Subject: RE: joint letter 
Date: Sun, 07 Nov 2021 21:02:11 +0000 
Attachments: 2021-11-08 joint_letter_regardingjuror_questionnaires.v2.doex 
Hi=, 
Could you please withdraw our objection to the three highlighted jurors, and update the letter and the spreadsheet? 
Thanks! 
From: 
Sent: Sunday, November 7, 2021 2:40 PM 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: RE: joint letter 
Hey —  the draft letter is attached, with all four categories filled in with the respective juror numbers. I'm also 
attaching the Excel sheet, containing defense and government objections, that contains all four lists in four different 
sheets. This Excel sheet is also saved on the shared in the jury selection folder. 
If anything needs to be edited, I'll be around for a bit longer today but I'm unavailable later this afternoon/evening, after 
3:30pm today. have kindly offered to handle any edits tonight when I'm offline, 
so I can loop them in if 
necessary. 
Thanks so much! 
From: 
Sent: Sunday, November 7, 2021 2:06 PM 
To: 
Cc: fl
; 
Subject: joint letter 
Hi=, 
> 
> 
Thanks so much for all you're doing today, really appreciate it. Attached is a draft of the joint letter for today with the four 
categories. Could you please fill those in after you've had a chance to enter all the data from the defense? I'm fine with 
charts in each of the four questions (essentially just one row of cells with juror numbers). Also fine with bullet points. 
Whichever is easiest. 
Whenever you're at point when you have a sense of the timeline for this, that would be helpful to know —  we'll need to 
send this to the defense with ample time to review for accuracy, so hoping to do that later this afternoon. 
Thanks! 
EFTA00022179

Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
One Saint Andrew's Plaza 
New York, NY 10007 
EFTA00022180
